Text: Hi artpepper,can you tell me the best application/programme to view these E-books please,i have downloaded a couple and dont know how to view them,i would like this one also...thanks

Easily the best, smallest and fastest .pdf viewer is Foxit. It's free (in its basic form) and can be downloaded here:

http://www.foxitsoftware.com/pdf/reader/reader3.php

It's what I've been using for years to view .pdf files. Hope this helps.

...or you could get the Pro version here at TPB:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5191438/Foxit.Reader.Pro.v3.1.4.1125.Cracked-EAT
very helpful,thanks very much,i will now look through the E-books for more
Thanks artpepper for this excellent and beautifully colour illustrated book on birds.

Thanks a ton artpepper !
What lovely books are available on Pirate Bay !!
Long Live PirateBay !!!
